welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Baiersbronn, a charming town nestled in the Black Forest of Germany! Indulge in our renowned culinary scene and immerse yourself in the breathtaking nature surrounding us. Enjoy your stay and discover all that Baiersbronn has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Karlsruhe/Baden-Baden Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Black Forest Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Black Forest Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
